channel.title: Hammer help
channel.description: I started up hammer and it is in some weird mode where you move up and down by right clicking and dragging the mouse and turn by left clicking and dragging. I can't select any brushes either. How do I turn this off? I've already tried rebooting Hammer with no luck.

item.title: Hammer help
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
RabidMonkey:

Are you talking about movement in the 3D view? You are probably in ‘camera’ mode (the camera icon on the toolbar) - click on the arrow icon above it to return to ‘selection’ mode.

Holding down the space bar in 3D view also acts as a hotkey for camera mode - hold down space and move around with the mouse, and release to return to normal selection mode.

Thanks a lot, that worked. What threw me off was the camera icon was not selected and I was in select mode, but holding down space worked.

EDIT: got another problem, I frantically pressed keys trying to get hammer out of the camera mode and now acidently set myself in some mode where I can move and reshape objects in the 3d view. How do I turn this off?

EDIT #2: problem fixed itself.
